data.message: Hi I think you your alright your songs are good but are you a good person from all thst music stuff cause all cause sum 1 is so good singing but are you a really nice person in person and just asking cause it don't bother me what you do singing all what ever your not 1 them thst pretends to be all that and that you love your fans but really are you a truly nice person out side away from all that
